SEARCH
程序包 jep

类 PyConfig

java.lang.Object
jep.PyConfig
public class PyConfig extends Object

A configuration object for setting Python pre-initialization parameters.

从以下版本开始:
3.6
作者:
Jeff V Stein

  • 方法详细资料

    • setNoSiteFlag

      public PyConfig setNoSiteFlag(int noSiteFlag)
      Set the Py_NoSiteFlag variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the python "-S" flag and will prevent the "site" module from being automatically loaded.
      参数:
      noSiteFlag - value to pass to Python for Py_NoSiteFlag
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setNoUserSiteDirectory

      public PyConfig setNoUserSiteDirectory(int noUserSiteDirectory)
      Set the Py_NoUserSiteDirectory variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the python "-s" flag and will prevent the user's local python site directory from being added to sys.path.
      参数:
      noUserSiteDirectory - value to pass to Python for Py_NoUserSiteDirectory
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setIgnoreEnvironmentFlag

      public PyConfig setIgnoreEnvironmentFlag(int ignoreEnvironmentFlag)
      Set the Py_IgnoreEnvironmentFlag variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the python "-E" flag and will instruct python to ignore all PYTHON* environment variables (e.g. PYTHONPATH).
      参数:
      ignoreEnvironmentFlag - value to pass to Python for Py_IgnoreEnvironmentFlag
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setVerboseFlag

      public PyConfig setVerboseFlag(int verboseFlag)
      Set the Py_VerboseFlag variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the python "-v" flag and will increase verbosity, in particular tracing import statements.
      参数:
      verboseFlag - value to pass to Python for Py_VerboseFlag
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setOptimizeFlag

      public PyConfig setOptimizeFlag(int optimizeFlag)
      Set the Py_OptimizeFlag variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the python "-O" flag and will slightly optimize the generated bytecode.
      参数:
      optimizeFlag - value to pass to Python for Py_OptimizeFlag
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setDontWriteBytecodeFlag

      public PyConfig setDontWriteBytecodeFlag(int dontWriteBytecodeFlag)
      Set the Py_DontWriteBytecodeFlag variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the python "-B" flag and will instruct python to not write .py[co] files on import.
      参数:
      dontWriteBytecodeFlag - value to pass to Python for Py_DontWriteBytecodeFlag
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setHashRandomizationFlag

      public PyConfig setHashRandomizationFlag(int hashRandomizationFlag)
      Set the Py_HashRandomizationFlag variable on the python interpreter. This corresponds to the environment variable PYTHONHASHSEED.
      参数:
      hashRandomizationFlag - value to pass to Python for Py_HashRandomizationFlag
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig

    • setPythonHome

      public PyConfig setPythonHome(String pythonHome)
      Set the home location on the python interpreter. THis is the location of the standard python libraries. This corresponds to the environment variable PYTHONHOME.
      参数:
      pythonHome - the home location of the python installation
      返回:
      a reference to this PyConfig
